page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The method of approach-D/Block 05200192 The Domesday Block was sub-divided among the participating schools in the following way. {*****************}Grid Squares 1,2,3_ {* 1 * 2 * 3 * 4 *}Mill Hill County{ {* * * * *}High School. {*****************}Grid Squares 4,8,12_ {* 5 * 6 * 7 * 8 *}The Mount School. {* * * * *}Grid Squares 5,9_ {*****************}Edgware Junior { {* 9 * 10* 11* 12*}School and Deansbr_ {* * * * *}ook School. {***************** Grid Square 6_ Courtland School. Grid Squares 7,11_ St. Paul's Church of England School. Grid Square 10_ Goodwyn School.
